title: Necaxa (New Episode)
overview: Necaxa, a new docuseries from Eva Longoria in partnership with Welcome to Wrexham's Rob McElhenney and Ryan Reynolds, the three of whom are all investors in Aguascalientes, Mexico-based Club Necaxa. The gripping new series chronicling a turbulent and transformational era at the storied Mexican football club and the steadfast supporters who never give up hope arrives this summer.
